Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez demanded free tuition for the Electoral College, which is not supported by any factual evidence.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or sources to support the assertion that Ocasio-Cortez made such a demand.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the provided quote from Ocasio-Cortez is actually from a satirical website and not a genuine statement made by her.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the stance of Ocasio-Cortez by combining two unrelated political stances she had previously voiced (eliminating the Electoral College and investing in tuition-free universities) into one statement.
